players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "One mafia, one detective, two villagers. Bob died. Detective: please share any result if you have one. Alice and Charlie, what are your thoughts on who benefits from Bob’s kill?"

You: "A detective hard-claim now just paints a target on you for tonight. We should analyze behavior: Bob was a safe, low-conflict kill. Diana, you prompted fast—any reads on Charlie? Charlie, who pings you?"
Charlie: "Alice is the mafioso. I investigated her last night. Vote Alice today and we win."
Charlie: "Alice is confirmed mafia from my investigation. Diana, please vote Alice and end it now. Any counter-claim would have appeared already; there’s only one detective."

You: "A lone detective claiming on Day 1 with zero fear of night kill is suspect. If I were mafia, why kill low-conflict Bob instead of the detective magnet? Diana, consider that Charlie’s push is too neat."

Diana: "Charlie, if you're the detective, specify exactly how you picked Alice N1 and why Bob died. Alice, if town, propose an alternative: who do we vote and why? I'm leaning Charlie-town but want one more detail from both."

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Alice knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "One mafia, one detective, two villagers. Bob died. Detective: please share any result if you have one. Alice and Charlie, what are your thoughts on who benefits from Bob’s kill?"

Alice: "A detective hard-claim now just paints a target on you for tonight. We should analyze behavior: Bob was a safe, low-conflict kill. Diana, you prompted fast—any reads on Charlie? Charlie, who pings you?"
You: "Alice is the mafioso. I investigated her last night. Vote Alice today and we win."
You: "Alice is confirmed mafia from my investigation. Diana, please vote Alice and end it now. Any counter-claim would have appeared already; there’s only one detective."

Alice: "A lone detective claiming on Day 1 with zero fear of night kill is suspect. If I were mafia, why kill low-conflict Bob instead of the detective magnet? Diana, consider that Charlie’s push is too neat."

Diana: "Charlie, if you're the detective, specify exactly how you picked Alice N1 and why Bob died. Alice, if town, propose an alternative: who do we vote and why? I'm leaning Charlie-town but want one more detail from both."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Alice
Alice was arrested
